name: Shoot&Choose
description:
It is your time now to take control of your character and defeat all enemies that stand before you. You will be facing a lot of challanges and the key of this game is patience. Your goal is to shoot your self through the levels and wisely choose between a treasure reward or an extra life which is very valuable as you progress through the game.
With great accuracy and fearless consistency, you will earn the rights to upgrade your characters, weapons, lasers and more.



HOW TO PLAY:
-> Touch screen to shoot laser beam from your launcher.

FEATURES:
-> Buying/upgrading items can improve quality of game experience.
-> Cool UI designs.
-> Buy/upgrade weapons, lasers, characters.
-> 21 levels with different designs and difficulty.
-> Build in reward system.
-> In-game shop.
--> Awesome challanges.
